title: Drawing, "Niagara Falls Seen from the Canadian Side", 1856
markings: Verso: Stamped at center: Lugt 457d, noir
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite at various locations:  dark purple blue / thunder / more / more / darker more purple / grey cool / dusky hot yellowish light / dark bluish neutral / ......(?) / as / brilliant / warm / shadow green / luminous / emerald green shadow / yellow green / cool green (Niagara) (56)

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Niagara Falls Seen from the Canadian Side", 1856.
1856. Graphite on green  wove paper. Gift of Louis P. Church. 1917-4-141.
